plot: Calimero is a small chicken who wears half of his eggshell on his head. He goes to school and plays with a girl chick named Priscilla who is his girlfriend and the troublesome Peter Duck tries to mess with him sometimes.Calimero is a small pullet which comes always in problems, because he is a good person. He has a girlfriend, Priscilla. But when Calimero does something stupid, Pieter continue of it rapidly with her.
ending_theme: "Kono kao da are?" by Rina Yamazaki
